Title: Requires that public contracts be divided by size into large, medium, small and micro contracts for the purpose of increasing opportunities for small businesses, including MWBEs, to participate in state contracts
Summary: Requires that public contracts be divided by size into large, medium, small and micro contracts for the purpose of increasing opportunities for small businesses, including minority-owned business enterprises and women-owned business enterprises, to participate in state contracts.
LawCode: Amd ยง163, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring that public contracts be divided by size into large, medium, small and micro contracts for the purpose of increasing opportunities for small businesses to participate in state contracts
